scripts.deploy-contracts-testnet: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy_eConnectGov.ts --network bsc_testnet && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy_eConnectUtility.ts --network bsc_testnet && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy_eConnectNFT.ts --network bsc_testnet
scripts.deploy-contracts-mainnet: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy_eConnectGov.ts --network bsc_mainnet && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy_eConnectUtility.ts --network bsc_mainnet && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy_eConnectNFT.ts --network bsc_mainnet
